DocNow

About

This site was built to provide classroom materials and help support twarc users, thanks in part to a Mellon Foundation grant.

The included pages provide instructions on installing and using Twarc. Parts of this guide are subject to change with updates to Twitterâ€™s developers site, so please use this guide as a general guideline. For troubleshooting with Twarc, please contact the developers of DocNow, and join in conversation with the DocNow community of scholars, students, and archivists.

For more information on Twarc or other DocNow tools, please visit their site.
